articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ecuadorian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Ecuadorian Figure
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the coordinator of the National Electoral Council of Ecuador.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Peru by Rene Mauge Mosquera, coordinator of the council, on March 4.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Delegation
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Centre of the Cuban Workers headed by General Secretary Ulises Guilarte De Nacimiento, who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall. 
					 The general secretary said the Cuba-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation provided by respected Fidel Castro Ruz and President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, have been developed by respected Raul Castro Ruz and leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The peoples of the two countries have fought shoulder to shoulder with the common ideal, smashing the moves of the imperialists disturbing world peace and stability, he said, and went on:
					
					 The eye-opening achievements made in the DPRK are showing the will of the Korean people to vigorously advance under the uplifted banner of the revolution under the guidance of their leader.
					
					 The general secretary sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and bigger successes in his responsible work for leading the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people will always win victory in the anti-imperialist struggle and never yield to any difficulties, he expressed belief that the Cuban people will steadily strengthen the eternal relations of comrades-in-arms with the Korean people.

articles.title: Cambodian King Supports Korean People
articles.content:
Cambodian King Supports Korean People
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Hong Ki Chol, DPRK ambassador to Cambodia, paid a farewell visit to Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, on March 9.
					 The Cambodian king said that Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, together with Great King Norodom Sihanouk, provided and deepened the excellent friendship between the two countries.
					
					 He noted that he was pleased with the steady development of this valuable and historic friendship under the great care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He extended sincere congratulations to the DPRK on its great successes in all fields including economic development and improvement of people's livelihood under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Cambodia will as ever firmly support Kim Jong Un's determination and line for the wellbeing of the Korean people, peaceful reunification of Korea and durable peace on the Korean peninsula, he added.

articles.title: Cuban Delegation Tours Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cuban Delegation Tours Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Centre of the Cuban Workers headed by General Secretary Ulises Guilarte De Nacimiento visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before his old home in Mangyongdae in reverence for him.
					
					 Being briefed on his revolutionary history and patriotic lives of his family members in Mangyongdae, they went round the historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They toured the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Sci-Tech Complex, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, etc.

articles.title: Disaster Risk Reduction Activities Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Disaster Risk Reduction Activities Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Branches of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society have steadily conducted activities for community-based disaster risk reduction.
					 They are stepping up propaganda for the aftereffect of natural calamity and importance of disaster prevention among inhabitants in close connection with relevant power organs. And they also encourage citizens and schoolchildren to take active part in environmental protection like road and river improvement and tree planting.
					
					 It is now pushed forward in South and North Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces to disseminate information of disaster prevention and mitigation, environmental protection, etc. through sci-tech rooms.
					
					 Meanwhile, young RC volunteers are giving artistic performances calling for disaster prevention and environmental protection.

articles.title: New Frequency Converter Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Frequency Converter Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A newly-developed bulk high-pressure frequency converter has proven effective in economic sectors in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The converter, high in power factor and efficiency with no effect on power system, ensures the safety of large-capacity electric equipment.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex applied this converter to its oxygen heat blast furnace to carry on the production under any power supply condition, with 20 percent less consumption of electricity.
					
					 The converter was made jointly by the Electric Power Industry Research Institute under the Ministry of Electric Power Industry and the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 According to Ri Kwang Mun, director of the Institute, the development of the new converter is of weighty significance in ensuring the normal operation of large-capacity electric equipment and turning the country's electricity control system into an electricity-saving one.

articles.title: Major Construction Projects Progress Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Major Construction Projects Progress Apace in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The units under the Capital City Construction Commission are speeding up ten-odd major construction projects to finish them before the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (slated for May).
					 The projects include the remodeling of Kim Il Sung Stadium, the second-phase remodeling of the Central Zoo, expanding the capacity of the Central Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the construction of a notebook factory.
					
					 Frame assembling was finished at all projects in a little over 15 days from the start of the 70-day campaign and the exterior and interior construction works are now going on at the final stage, according to an official concerned.
					
					 Meanwhile, related industrial establishments have carried out their daily production assignments at 120 percent to supply in time building materials to the projects.

articles.title: Campaign for Establishing Cultured Way of Life in DPRK
articles.content:
Campaign for Establishing Cultured Way of Life in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The citizens in the DPRK have observed March and April as hygienic months every year.
					 A brisk campaign is now going on in the country to better the environmental conditions.
					
					 Kim Nam Il, department director of the Ministry of Urban Management, told KCNA:
					
					 Works were launched at all residential districts and working sites to remove all traces of the winter season and spruce up their surroundings, while repairing buildings and facilities and giving a face-lifting to streets, villages and parks.
					
					 Big efforts are paid to planting good species of trees and turfs and boosting the rate of their rooting.
					
					 Meanwhile, steps were taken to improve water supply and drainage system and sanitary facilities as well as working conditions.
					
					 In Pyongyang a dynamic work goes on to keep the environment around the Taedong River neat and tidy.

articles.title: Line of Two Fronts Is Strategic Line: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Line of Two Fronts Is Strategic Line: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is a strategic line to be consistently held fast to as long as the imperialists' moves for aggression persist, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the steadfast faith of the army and people of the DPRK to carry on the dynamic struggle to glorify the DPRK as matchless nuclear power under the banner of the line of the two fronts.
					
					 The unprecedented "sanctions" and military provocations of the hostile forces go to clearly prove that the position of the DPRK as a power is growing strong in Northeast Asia and the world political arena and its military muscle is so tremendous that even the allied forces of imperialism dare not underrate it.
					
					 The DPRK's option is just and no one can block its advance. This is the immutable truth proved by history.
					
					 The nuclear war hysteria of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group denying it is as foolish as precipitating their self-destruction.
					
					 The enemies' desperate efforts only bring earlier the time to start a sacred war for achieving the country's reunification and set the hearts of all service personnel and people ablaze with the will to retaliate against them. 
					
					 U.S. defeated generals confessed that the Korean War was the wrong war which the U.S. ignited in the wrong place and at the wrong time and fought against the wrong rival. This confession will always be etched in the memory of the aggressors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Evading Compensation for Their Gangsterism in Sea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Evading Compensation for Their Gangsterism in Sea
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet ship Highny deliberately bumped against the DPRK ship Turubong-3 on its routine fishing in the East Sea of Korea in October last year, causing a serious damage and taking to flight.
					 Several months have passed since the incident but the puppet authorities have refused to make an apology and compensation. They are now evading the responsibility under the pretext of the prevailing tense situation between the north and the south.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Their behavior is a mean and shameless trick to cover up the truth behind the case and dodge the responsibility for it through procrastination.
					
					 What touches off bitter anger is that the puppet forces are justifying their reckless act by citing the prevailing situation, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Their behavior reminds an incendiary shouting "Fire!" It is none other than the puppet forces who created a touch-and-go situation through dangerous moves for a nuclear war against the north in collusion with outsiders. They are, however, working hard to evade the responsibility for the above-said incident by taking advantage of the grave situation created by them. They are the worst gangsters and depraved pirates.
					
					 Like master, like man the witch of Chongwadae is going mad with confrontation and war and stupid gangsters of the ship are following suit.
					
					 "Humanitarianism" and "human rights in the north" touted by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors would only bring to light the ugly nature of those engrossed in all fascist acts and confrontation with compatriots in the north while abusing human rights.
					
					 The Park group had better stop its poor charade at once and make apology and compensation for the crimes it committed against the ship of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Justifying War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Justifying War Drills against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The world public is now strongly  demanding a stop to the on-going U.S.-south Korea joint military drills, terming them very dangerous saber-rattling wrecking peace on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the region.
					 But the U.S., far from paying heed to it, is spouting rubbish that it would push ahead with the war rehearsals as scheduled, terming them "a strong message to north's provocation." It means that the saber-rattling is just a "countermeasure" against "provocations."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 The U.S. claim is nothing but sheer sophism. The provocateurs are the U.S. and south Korean warmongers.
					
					 The largest-ever Ssangyong joint landing drills are now underway in south Korea under the simulated conditions of landing on the territory of the DPRK to advance into its depth to "eliminate" its supreme leadership and core facilities.
					
					 Many small or big military drills are taking place on the earth at present but there were no such rehearsals as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the headquarters of a country.
					
					 As Washington is kicking up war hysteria as its last-ditch effort to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, its army and people can never remain a passive onlooker to it.
					
					 Inevitable is their military counteraction. The enemy will have to pay the dearest price for its provocation - the most miserable ruin and death.

articles.title: Minju Joson Raps Japan's "Security Legislation"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Raps Japan's "Security Legislation"
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Days ago the defense minister of Japan at a seminar held in Tokyo blustered that the Japan-U.S. alliance would perform its perfect role and its deterrence would be bolstered up to provide a firmer guarantee for Japan's security thanks to the "Security Legislation."
					 He added that when he met leaders of different countries, he did not hear any criticism of the "Security Legislation" as war law.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The "Security Legislation" of Japan is a war law as it extended the military operation sphere of the "Self-Defense Forces" to worldwide under the signboard of Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" though it had been limited to surrounding areas of Japan in the past. 
					
					 Japan is working hard to remove all the obstacles to its overseas aggression, backed by the U.S., and set the stage for waging a war of aggression.
					
					 Viewing such ambition of Japan as conforming with the crafty interest of the U.S. in carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific by putting forward Japan as a shock brigade for aggression, Washington amended "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines" together with Tokyo and let it adopt the "Security Legislation" last year.
					
					 Upbeat over the legal framework made for overseas aggression, Japan unhesitatingly conducts extremely dangerous military actions.
					
					 However, Japan, obsessed with reinvasion and worship of the U.S., does not think at all about the consequences to be entailed by their actions.
					
					 The U.S. is not the "only superpower" in the world which Japan thinks of but just a war maniac keen to realize the anachronistic scenario to dominate the world, overconfident of its muscle.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to stop going foolish.

articles.title: Koreans in China Slam Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 16
articles.content:
Koreans in China Slam Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 16
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released a statement on March 8 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging dangerous war drills for invading the north.
					 Recalling that they kicked off the adventurous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises against the DPRK on March 7 despite unanimous protest of the public at home and abroad, the statement said:
					
					 We vehemently condemn the south Korean warmongers for their dangerous war rehearsals to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better stop such reckless saber-rattling, mindful that their servile attitude toward the U.S. criminal hostile policy toward the DPRK is a criminal act of disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula and blocking the development of the inter-Korean relations and reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers should think twice about the serious consequences to be entailed by the provocative war exercises against the DPRK and immediately stop them.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Illegal Moves to Meddle in Election Denounced by Newspaper
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Illegal Moves to Meddle in Election Denounced by Newspaper
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on its website on March 11 laid bare Park Geun Hye's ill-boding moves to illegally meddle in the "National Assembly" election.
					 Recalling Park's tour of different places in Taegu on March 9, the editorial noted:
					
					 All places she visited are the ones where her confidants ardently wish to be elected.
					
					 Looking back on the past when power organs have zealously resorted to the law-breaking moves under the present "government," the editorial expressed concern over Park's recent tour that it might lead to all-out power-backed election and the Intelligence Service's illegal interference in politics.
					
					 The editorial urged the south Korean chief executive to wash her hands off the general election, warning the politics of dividing the people is bound to prove counter-productive.

articles.title: Peace against War Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Peace against War Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification simultaneously waged activities for peace against war on March 12 to protest the landing operation exercises conducted by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers in Pohang area, North Kyongsang Province aimed at an "advance into Pyongyang".
					 The organizations said that the landing exercises and the operation of advancing northward were a dangerous military move to attack, invade and conquer the north.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint landing exercises will heighten the military tension on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and increase the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The participants marched demanding peace against war.

articles.title: World Will See How Justice Is Protected: Deputy Chief of Koreans Organization in China
articles.content:
World Will See How Justice Is Protected: Deputy Chief of Koreans Organization in China
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, made public a statement on March 10 condemning the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for kicking off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises in the wake of cooking up the brigandish "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK over its bolstering of nuclear deterrence for self-defense and legitimate satellite launch. 
					 He said:
					
					 The DPRK proves in practice that it is standing firm against the U.S. imperialists and their followers under the banner of independence, the banner of justice to protect justice and achieve peace.
					
					 The U.S. is quite ignorant of the strong might of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK remains unfazed by the "sanctions" and joint military drills of the U.S. imperialists and their followers as it has invariably followed the road of self-defence while consolidating the foundation for its existence on the principle of self-reliance and self-development despite the imperialist allied forces' siege and sanctions since the early days after its birth.
					
					 They had better lift their counter-productive "sanctions" against the DPRK and stop war games for aggression, though belatedly.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Russia
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A Russian public preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on March 9.
					 V.A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee consisting of prominent public figures of Russia.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, film show, book and photo exhibition and other political and cultural events on the occasion.

articles.title: WPK's Seventh Congress to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
WPK's Seventh Congress to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A Russian public committee for supporting the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was formed on March 7.
					 V.A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee consisting of prominent figures of the Russian public.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the great achievements of the WPK and arrange a seminar, film show and other diverse events on the occasion.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Britain
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Britain
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 7.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the President's revolutionary exploits, bring out in booklet works of Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize political and cultural events including a meeting and seminar in the run-up to the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Prague on March 9.
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to fix the celebration period from March 9 to April 20 and organize diverse and significant, political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned by Russians
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned by Russians
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Four political parties and organizations in Russia including the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Nakhodka Branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia" made public a joint statement on March 8 condemning the hostile acts of the U.S. imperialists and their followers against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We strongly denounce the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers abused the UNSC to cook up the "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK, taking issue with it over its H-bomb test for self-defense and satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 They are massing their huge armed forces for aggression on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity.
					
					 Humankind is obliged to support the Korean people who are struggling to terminate the U.S. war moves for disturbing the peace and security on the peninsula and checking the reunification of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea should stop their joint military exercises.
					
					 It is entirely just that the DPRK demands the U.S. troops pull out of south Korea.
					
					 We will positively support the just struggle of the Korean people for the defence of socialism, prosperity of the country, durable peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: Hungarian Politician Wants Peace in Korea
articles.content:
Hungarian Politician Wants Peace in Korea
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- A statement made by Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was posted on its website on March 9.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK has a right to protect its sovereignty and the U.S. and south Korea are not entitled to blame the DPRK for it.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military maneuvers.
					
					 They are faltering out an excuse that the military maneuvers are to stand up against "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to beat back the enemy's invasion.
					
					 The U.S. should opt for coming out negotiations for peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Nigerian Political Party Slams U.S.-S. Korea Military Rehearsals
articles.content:
Nigerian Political Party Slams U.S.-S. Korea Military Rehearsals
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria made public a statement on March 9 denouncing the reckless war rehearsals of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces aimed to carry out the preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Their joint military exercises pushed the Korean peninsula into an appalling situation in which a war may break out any time.
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test was the measure for self-defense to protect its sovereignty and national right to existence from the hostile forces' growing nuclear threat, and its launch of satellite is the exercise of a legitimate right granted by international law to other countries.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. and south Korean authorities, not content with finding faults with the DPRK's H-bomb test and satellite launch, are staging the dangerous war rehearsals, a very grave military provocation which pushes the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria strongly censures saber-rattling and presses for an immediate halt to it.

articles.title: German Organization Accuses Park Geun Hye of Ruining Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
German Organization Accuses Park Geun Hye of Ruining Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article on its website on March 7 to support the statement of a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea denouncing Park Geun Hye for ruining the inter-Korean relations.
					 Ridiculing the present chief executive of south Korea Park Geun Hye as a political prostitute who lives on serving her U.S. master, the article said:
					
					 Park is a traitor who left the south Korean people to the mercy of the U.S.
					
					 The fascist regime in south Korea bankrupted many big or small business companies of south Korea by closing the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					
					 The regime has also stepped up the biggest-ever arms buildup under the false excuse of "threat from the north".
					
					 Park will not be able to evade the stern punishment by history like her father Park Chung-Hee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de personalidad ecuatoriana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de personalidad ecuatoriana
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dedicara el coordinador del Consejo Nacional Electoral del Ecuador, Rene Mauje Mosquera.
					La personalidad ecuatoriana lo entrego el dia 4 al embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditado en el Peru.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de CTC
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de CTC
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 14 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Central de Trabajadores de Cuba encabezada por su secretario general Ulises Guilarte De Nacimiento que le hizo visita de cortesia.
					En la ocasion, Ulises Guilarte De Nacimiento dijo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Cuba y Corea, preparadas por el estimado companero Fidel Castro Ruz y el camarada Kim Il Sung, gran Lider del pueblo coreano, fueron consolidadas y desarrolladas aun mas gracias al companero Raul Castro Ruz y los grandes camaradas Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un.
					
					Recordo que con el ideal comun, los pueblos de dos paises lucharon hombro con hombro frustrando las maniobras de los imperialistas que destruyen la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					Senalo que los admirables exitos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea devienen la manifestacion de la voluntad del pueblo coreano de marchar con pasos firmes bajo la direccion de su lider enarbolando la bandera de la revolucion.
					
					Deseo con sinceridad al estimado camarada Kim Jong Un buena salud y mayores exitos en sus labores responsables de dirigir la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Afirmo que el pueblo coreano saldra siempre victorioso en la lucha antiimperialista y no se doblegara ante cualesquiera dificultades y destaco que el pueblo cubano seguira fortaleciendo y desarrollando las relaciones de eterno companero de arma con el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a EE.UU que justifica ejercicios militares
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a EE.UU que justifica ejercicios militares
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- El mundo exige fuertemente el cese inmediato de los ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos-el Sur de Corea calificandolos de los actos peligrosisimos que destruyen la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					Pero, el pais norteamericano, en vez de prestar oidos a esta exigencia, no quiere abandonar sus juegos belicos describiendolos como "mensaje de advertencia rotunda a la provocacion del Norte". O sea, insiste en que sus alborotos militares devienen una "contramedida" pura frente a la "provocacion".
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 14, Rodong Sinmun denuncio tales insistencias de EE.UU. como una sofisteria tan absurda.
					
					El provocador es EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, destaca el diario y continua:
					
					En el Sur de Corea esta desarrollandose de manera frenetica el simulacro conjunto de desembarco Ssangryong que tiene como su objetivo la "eliminacion" de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC y la destruccion de las importantes instalaciones al desembarcar en la region de la RPDC y avanzar hacia su fondo.
					
					Hoy, en este globo terraqueo se desarrollan incontables ejercicios militares de tamano grande y pequeno, pero, ninguno de ellos presenta como su blanco la Direccion Suprema de otro pais como lo hacen los ejercicios como "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					Los militares y los civiles de la RPDC no pueden estar mas con brazos cruzados dado que EE.UU. hace esfuerzos histericos por aplastar con las fuerzas militares la RPDC.
					
					Es inevitable el enfrentamiento militar de la RPDC.
					
					Los provocadores sufriran solo la destruccion y la muerte mas demoledoras.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena al Sur de Corea que evita disculpa y recompensa
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena al Sur de Corea que evita disculpa y recompensa
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- En octubre de 2015 el barco surcoreano HIGHNY choco intencionalmente contra el barco "Turubong-3" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que hacia la normal pesca en el Mar Este de Corea.
					Aunque pasaron varios meses desde dicho caso que causo grandes danos, la horda titere vino dando espalda al problema de la disculpa y recompensa. Hoy en dia, intenta evadirlo persistentemente pretextando la situacion actual entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Esto es la artimana vil y descarada destinada a encubrir la verdad del caso y prolongar el tiempo para liberarse de la responsabilidad.
					
					Asi condena el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					En particular, los titeres surcoreanos justifican tal actitud so pretexto de la situacion actual.
					
					Hay un refran: "El incendiario grita !fuego!". Los autores que agravaron la tension desarrollando las peligrosas maniobras de provocacion de guerra agresiva al Norte de Corea en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas, pretenden evadirse de la responsabilidad de sus barbaridades gangsteriles perpetradas en el mar abusando de la peor situacion. En el mundo no hay los bandidos y corruptos iguales con ellos.
					
					Ahora cuando Park Geun-hye, mujer malvada de Chongwadae recurre con frenesi a la confrontacion y la guerra, hasta los gangsteres del barco HIGHNY hacen locuras imitandola.
					
					Cuanto mas picotean los compinches traidores de Park sobre el supuesto "humanitarismo" y "derechos humanos del Norte", tanto mas se revelara solo la figura sucia de ellos mismos enloquecidos por los actos malvados fascistas de toda indole y el enfrentamiento fratricida dando espaldas a los DDHH.
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye debe pedir disculpas por el crimen cometido contra el barco de la RPDC y compensarlo abandonando de inmediato la farsa pueril.

articles.title: "Ley de seguridad" de Japon es la belica, insiste Minju Joson
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a EE.UU que justifica ejercicios militares
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- El mundo exige fuertemente el cese inmediato de los ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos-el Sur de Corea calificandolos de los actos peligrosisimos que destruyen la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					Pero, el pais norteamericano, en vez de prestar oidos a esta exigencia, no quiere abandonar sus juegos belicos describiendolos como "mensaje de advertencia rotunda a la provocacion del Norte". O sea, insiste en que sus alborotos militares devienen una "contramedida" pura frente a la "provocacion".
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 14, Rodong Sinmun denuncio tales insistencias de EE.UU. como una sofisteria tan absurda.
					
					El provocador es EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, destaca el diario y continua:
					
					En el Sur de Corea esta desarrollandose de manera frenetica el simulacro conjunto de desembarco Ssangryong que tiene como su objetivo la "eliminacion" de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC y la destruccion de las importantes instalaciones al desembarcar en la region de la RPDC y avanzar hacia su fondo.
					
					Hoy, en este globo terraqueo se desarrollan incontables ejercicios militares de tamano grande y pequeno, pero, ninguno de ellos presenta como su blanco la Direccion Suprema de otro pais como lo hacen los ejercicios como "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					Los militares y los civiles de la RPDC no pueden estar mas con brazos cruzados dado que EE.UU. hace esfuerzos histericos por aplastar con las fuerzas militares la RPDC.
					
					Es inevitable el enfrentamiento militar de la RPDC.
					
					Los provocadores sufriran solo la destruccion y la muerte mas demoledoras.
